text: An explicit solution to the n-queens problem for all n: <https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/122319.122322>

It's a common example for problem solved via search in AI classes. There is some general confusion about whether this problem is NP-hard or not. (N queens completion is, finding an arbitrary combinations is not)
